title: Dashboard
description: Welcome to your dashboard. This is a protected page that requires authentication.

myRegistrations.title: My registrations
myRegistrations.description: Track your upcoming and past event registrations.

emptyState.title: No registrations yet
emptyState.description: When you sign up for an event, it will show up here.

detail.ticketNote: Show this code or QR at check-in.
detail.paymentPendingNote: Payment is pending. You can complete payment once the feature is available.

admin.title: Admin workspace
admin.description: Manage events and users with elevated permissions.
admin.staffDescription: Staff access with limited admin capabilities.

users.title: User management
users.description: Manage administrators, staff, race directors, and athletes.
users.placeholder: User management tools will appear here.

tools.title: Staff tools
tools.description: Operational utilities and event management shortcuts.
tools.placeholder: Staff tools will be available soon.

metrics.sectionDescription: High-level signals for how RunGoMX is being used.

users.title: User signups
users.description: New accounts created across the platform.

profiles.title: Profiles created
profiles.description: Athlete and race director profiles with details filled in.
profiles.completionLabel: {rate, number} % of users with a profile

contactSubmissions.title: Feedback activity
contactSubmissions.description: Feedback submitted from the in-app dialog.

registrationsByRole.title: Registrations by role
registrationsByRole.description: Breakdown of new signups by external role in the selected period.

operations.feedbackRateDescription: How often users send feedback in the selected period.
operations.feedbackRateLabel: Feedback entries relative to total users

events.title: Events
events.description: Manage your events and race registrations.

metadata.title: Events | RunGoMX
metadata.description: Manage your events and race registrations on RunGoMX.

events.comingSoon: Events management is coming soon. This feature is currently under development.

emptyState.title: No events yet
emptyState.description: Create your first event to start managing registrations.

createEvent.title: Create event
createEvent.description: Set up a new event for your organization.

organization.title: Select organization
organization.description: Choose the organization that will host this event, or create a new one.

event.title: Event details
event.descriptionPlaceholder: Share what makes this event special...

slugStatus.error: Could not verify; will validate on submit

detail.manageEventDescription: Edit event details, dates, and registration settings
detail.manageFaqDescription: Add and edit frequently asked questions
detail.managePoliciesDescription: Set refund, transfer, and deferral placeholders
detail.manageWebsiteDescription: Customize your event page sections and content
detail.managePricingDescription: Set early bird and tiered pricing schedules
detail.viewPublicPageDescription: See how your event appears to participants
detail.noDistances: No distances added yet. Go to settings to add distances.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Add questions and answers that will be displayed on your event page.
faq.emptyState: No FAQ items yet. Add your first question to help participants understand your event.

waivers.title: Waivers
waivers.description: Create waivers that participants must accept before registering.
waivers.emptyState: No waivers yet. Add your first waiver to collect participant consent.

policies.title: Policies
policies.description: Add placeholders for refund, transfer, and deferral policies.

deferral.title: Deferral policy
deferral.description: Explain deferral or credit rules and deadlines.

settings.title: Event Settings
settings.description: Configure your event details, visibility, distances, and registration settings.

wizard.title: Finish setting up your event
wizard.description: Add your first distance, then publish when you are ready to share.

steps.distance: Add at least one distance with pricing.
steps.publish: Publish the event to make it visible.

visibility.title: Event Visibility
visibility.description: Control who can see and access your event. Published events appear in the public directory.

errors.missingDistances: Add at least one distance before publishing.
errors.missingPrices: Add at least one price for every distance before publishing.
errors.generic: Unable to update visibility. Please try again.

registration.title: Registration Status
registration.description: Pause or resume registration for this event. Paused events won't accept new registrations.

heroImage.title: Hero image
heroImage.description: Show a wide image on your event page and directory card.

errors.invalidType: Please upload a JPG, PNG, WebP, or GIF.
errors.saveFailed: Could not save the hero image.

capacity.title: Capacity settings
capacity.description: Choose whether capacity is per distance or shared across the event.
capacity.toggleHelp: When enabled, all distances pull from one shared pool.
capacity.sharedCapacityHelp: Total registrants allowed across all distances.

errors.required: Enter a total capacity to enable shared pool mode.

descriptionField.label: Event description
descriptionField.help: Give participants a clear overview of the event.

distances.title: Distances
distances.empty: No distances added yet. Add your first distance to enable registration.
distances.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this distance? This action cannot be undone.

website.title: Website Content
website.description: Customize the content sections that appear on your public event page.

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: Main event description and terrain information.
overview.contentPlaceholder: Describe your event, what makes it special, and what participants should expect...

course.title: Course Information
course.description: Course details, aid stations, and cutoff times.
course.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe the course layout and key features...

schedule.title: Schedule & Logistics
schedule.description: Packet pickup, parking, and race day information.
schedule.packetPickupPlaceholder: When and where participants can pick up their race packets...
schedule.raceDayPlaceholder: What to bring, check-in time, start area details...

media.title: Photos & Documents
media.description: Photo gallery and downloadable documents like convocatoria.

photos.title: Photo Gallery
photos.description: Add photos to showcase your event.
photos.comingSoon: Photo gallery will be available in a future update.

documents.title: Documents
documents.description: Upload PDF documents like race convocatoria, course maps, or rules.
documents.empty: No documents uploaded yet. Add your convocatoria or other documents.
documents.selectFile: Click or drag to select a PDF file

pricing.title: Pricing Tiers
pricing.description: Manage pricing tiers for each distance. Set early bird pricing, regular pricing, and late registration fees.
pricing.selectDistance: Select a distance to manage pricing
pricing.noDistances: No distances available. Add distances in event settings first.

tier.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this pricing tier?
tier.cannotDeleteLast: Each distance must have at least one pricing tier.
tier.dateOverlap: Date range overlaps with another tier

help.title: How pricing tiers work
help.description: Create multiple pricing tiers to offer early bird discounts or increase prices as the event date approaches. Only one tier can be active at a time based on the date ranges you set.

addOns.title: Add-ons
addOns.description: Create additional products or donations that participants can select during registration.
addOns.emptyState: No add-ons configured yet. Create your first add-on to offer merchandise or accept donations.

addOn.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this add-on and all its options?

option.title: Options
option.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this option?

help.title: How add-ons work
help.description: Add-ons allow you to sell merchandise (like t-shirts) or accept donations during registration. Each add-on can have multiple options with different prices.

coupons.title: Discount Coupons
coupons.description: Create promotional codes that participants can use to get discounts on registration.
coupons.emptyStateDescription: Create your first coupon to offer discounts to participants.

coupon.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this coupon? This action cannot be undone.
coupon.codeCannotChange: Code cannot be changed after creation
coupon.name: Internal name

help.title: How coupons work
help.description: Coupons let you offer percentage discounts to participants. Set optional validity dates and redemption limits to control when and how often the code can be used.

organizations.title: Organizations
organizations.description: Manage your organization memberships and team access.

emptyState.title: No organizations yet
emptyState.description: You'll see organizations here once you're invited or create one.

detail.membersDescription: Manage roles for your organization team.
detail.membersReadOnly: Only owners can add, remove, or change roles.
detail.membersEmpty: No members found for this organization.
detail.addMemberDescription: Invite teammates by email and assign their role.

errors.forbidden: You do not have permission to manage members.
errors.validation: Please check the form and try again.
errors.notFound: No user found with that email.
errors.alreadyMember: That user is already a member.
errors.lastOwner: You must keep at least one owner.
errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.

createDialog.title: Create Organization
createDialog.description: Create a new organization to manage events and team members.

banner.title: You'll be the owner
banner.description: You can invite team members and manage permissions after creation.

slug.label: URL Slug
slug.hint: Used in URLs. Only lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens.

errors.slugTaken: This slug is already taken. Please choose another.

slug.label: URL Slug
slug.hint: Used in URLs. Only lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens.

errors.slugTaken: This slug is already taken. Please choose another.

deleteDialog.title: Delete Organization
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.

warning.title: This is permanent
warning.description: All organization data, including member access, will be permanently deleted.

orgInfo.willBeDeleted: This organization will be permanently deleted

errors.unauthenticated: Sign in to delete this organization.
errors.forbidden: Only owners can delete an organization.
errors.hasActiveEvents: Cannot delete organization with {count, plural, one {# active event} other {# active events}}. Archive or delete all events first.
errors.genericError: Something went wrong. Please try again.

payout.title: Payout Settings
payout.description: Configure how you receive event registration payments.
payout.accessRestriction: Only organization owners and admins can view and edit payout settings.
payout.emptyState: No payout profile configured yet. Add your banking information to receive payments.

legalName.label: Legal Name
legalName.hint: The name that will appear on bank transfers

accountHolder.label: Account Holder Name
accountHolder.placeholder: Name as it appears on bank account

errors.forbidden: Only owners and admins can update payout settings.
errors.invalidRfc: Invalid RFC format. Please enter a valid Mexican Tax ID.
errors.generic: Failed to save payout settings. Please try again.

help.title: Why do we need this?
help.description: Payout information is required to transfer registration fees collected from your events. We use this to process secure bank transfers to your account.
